name: Quarterback Equalizer
description: The Quarterback Equalizer is a game and training tool that will change the way Quarterbacks approach the game! With levels of play from high school to pro, the Quarterback Equalizer will help you improve your Quarterback skills before a rep is taken on the field. You are the Quarterback in this game and every decision you make recognizing what the defense is doing impacts your teams drive towards the playoffs and the championship. You will have your very own coach that will take you through the strengths and weaknesses of each defense in the game.
